note:
Retired software engineer, architect, program manager, and director @ the world's greatest software company. Currently enjoying luthiery as a hobby, and considering part-time teaching positions to stay active and contribute back to a field that provided me a great living. I am interested in art, literature, music, and discussions about social justice. I also like a good joke.

Profile pic is of sunflowers in a green field with blue sky. Background pic is of a mountain with a lake in front.
